runs.comm: Absolute rubbish ball to start with. Pitched halfway down the pitch and far down leg side. No chance at all that anyone can stop that.
Absolute rubbish ball to start with. Pitched halfway down the pitch and far down leg side. No chance at all that anyone can stop that.
short of a length and again slipping down leg, another wide down the leg side, this isn't good bowling at all
short of a good length and on the off stump, punched down towards cover for a quick single
very full, on the pads, pacy delivery but the direction is really bad, Smith loves it there and he just whips the ball down to fine-leg for a boundary as easy as you please
short of a length and far outside the off, Smith leaves that alone, Sreesanth overcompensating with his line, lucky not to be called a wide
fullish and just a shade outside the off stump, a bit of late swing in, Smith shapes to play but the ball beats him all ends up and races through to the keeper
short of a driving length and outside the off, left well alone to the keeper. Erratic first over from Sreesanth but there was some promise there. 11 off it.

very full and on the stumps, RP Singh gets this ball bang on target. The ball swings back in Gibbs has only got his foot a bit down the pitch as the ball beats the bat and crashes into the pad. There's a spontaneous appeal and the finger goes up! India strike. Gibbs is not happy with the call and is shaking his head but he has to go. That was the perfect left-arm seamer's delivery to the right-hand batsman.
fullish and on the off, swinging in late and a fair bit, punched towards cover for a single
fullish and on the off, a hint of swing away for the left-handed Smith, punched to mid-off

Stunner! That is an absolute ripper from Dinesh Karthik in the slips cordon. It's a wide, swinging, full delivery from RP Singh and Smith has a real go at it. The ball flies off the outside edge really quick and wide. Karthik throws himself full length to his left and catches this one with both hands. That is a catch right out of the top drawer. You won't see too many more like that.

short of a length and outside the off, left alone to the keeper. Strange scenes here. After that stunning catch Karthik has taken over the gloves from Dhoni. Now the captain is at mid-off. Perhaps he wants to bowl later on?
short of a length and on the off, big movement off the seam into the batsman, played at and missed. Beaten for pace and rapped on the pad. Loud shout for the lbw. Not given. That was a close call.
full and outside the off, driven hard but straight to cover

Corker! very full, very fast, very straight. This is the straight one from Sreesanth and it's pacy. de Villiers is late on the shot and plays down the wrong line as well. This one is too close and he won't get away with it. Simon Taufel agrees with the bowler and up goes the finger
short of a good length and outside the off stump, left well alone to the keeper
short of a good length and outside the off, big outswinger this, left well alone, Karthik dives and catches. Wide called.
fullish and outside the off, left alone to the keeper
short of a driving length and outside the off, another one that moves away and again a wide. This isn't very good from Sreesanth.
fullish and on the off, punched away through point, carefully, all along the ground, down towards third-man
full and just on the off, a hint of swing away, driven at, off a thick outside edge to point, no chance of a run
just back of a driving length and on the off, big swing in to the batsman, driven at, off a thick inside edge onto pad
slightly shorter, outside the off, RP trying to get one to hold it's line. It's too far outside the off, though, and wide called
back of a length and on the pads, dabbed away awkwardly towards square-leg
fuller and outside the off, no swing on this one, Kemp opens the face of the bat and guides it down to point, straight to the fielder
short of a good length and outside the off stump, angling away, left alone to the keeper
short of a length and on the off, still some late swing in to the batsman who plays it down to third-man
full and outside the off, the ball starts a bit wide of the stumps and swings in late, defended with a straight bat towards power
back of a length and on middle and leg, this one is played at and missed, stifled shout for the lbw, that one was slipping down leg
short of a driving length and outside the off, hint of away swing, left alone to the keeper
short of a length and on the stumps. Attempted bouncer but it doesn't get nearly high enough to bother the tall Kemp who just rocks back and pulls to the square-leg fence
fullish and outside the off, Sreesanth bowls a length that the batsman can neither go forward nor back to. Swing and a miss, through to the keeper
just back of a length, a touch slower, on the off, defended down towards the off side
fullish and outside the off stump, left well alone to the keeper but that's not nearly wide enough to be called a wide. Better line and length from Sreesanth
short of a good length and outside the off. This one does not swing and Boucher can go back easily and cut the ball away to the point fence
short of a length, pitching outside the off and going further away with the angle. That's a big wide
fuller and on the off stump, this is a better line, defended back down the pitch to the bowler
fullish and a touch too straight, the batsman can walk across and work that away down to fine-leg

just short of a length and on the off. Driven away to the off side. Rohit Sharma swoops down on the ball from cover, picks the ball up one-handed on the dive and throws almost parallel to the ground. The throw is powerful and accurate and nails the stumps. That is a sensational bit of fielding and a big, big wicket for India
another short, wide ball. Amid all the stunning cricket India are giving away a lot of extras as well.

full, quick, swinging in, RP Singh comes around the stumps and fires a missile down the pitch. Pollock is late on the shot and the ball absolutely uproots the leg stump. That's a cracker of a ball and you can't really blame Pollock for that. India really turning on the heat here.
fullish and on the leg stump, just a bit of swing away from the left-handed Albie Morkel who is squared up and can only squirt the ball towards cover
full and on the off, hint of away swing there. Good line and length to begin with from Joginder Sharma. Defended back down the pitch
fullish and outside the off, driven through cover
just short of a good length and on the off stump, punched off the back foot to mid-off
full and outside the off, swinging in late, Morkel drives hard, off a thick inside edge back onto pad
fuller and on the off stump, driven down to mid-on, just wide enough for a single
full and on the off stump, hint of away swing, driven to mid-off. Tidy start from Joginder Sharma
fullish and on the off, quite exaggerated swing in to the batsman who played and missed, rapped on the pad, loud shout for the lbw but there's an inside edge on that one
fullish and on the middle and leg, swinging in quite a bit here, driven at and missed, rapped on the pad. Another loud shout for the lbw. Close but not close enough
fullish and on the off, swinging in, defended back down the pitch
full and on the off, driven down to mid-off, Dhoni misfields that one and lets the ball through for a single
fullish and outside the off stump, again a bit of swing, Morkel feels for it outside the off stump and is beaten. Through to the keeper
full and just outside the off, again Morkel feels for it and is beaten. Good start from Pathan
short of  driving length but drifting onto pad, off the thigh pad and this one runs away
short of a length and outside the off, left well alone, the ball swings away and the umpire has no trouble calling it wide
straighter and on the stumps, worked to the on side
fuller and on the off, a bit of swing in to the left-handed Albioe Morkel, off a thick inside edge to the on side
fuller and on the off, driven hard down to long-on for a couple
short of a good length and outside the off, driven hard but to the man at point
slower ball, on the off stump, Morkel flicks uppishly to the on side, Rohit Sharma dives forward but can't quite hold onto this one
short of a good length and on the pads, played down to fine-leg and good running gets the batsmen a couple
fuller and just a touch outside the off stump, driven at and missed, through to the keeper. That is a good ball and beats the bat.
full and outside the off, decent pace as well from Pathan. We haven't seen this kind of rhythm from him in a while. Played and missed. Through to the keeper
fuller and on the off, driven hard at, off a thick outside edge down to point
short of a length and on the off, driven to the on side
fullish and on the pads, loud, loud shout for the lbw as the batsman plays and misses. Doctrove says no and he's quite right on that occasion.
strays on to the pads and Boucher helps it down towards fine leg
length delivery wide outside off stump, Morkel has the opportunity to free his arms and he crashes the ball through the covers, Dhoni dives in vain on the boundary
full ball on the pads, Morkel tries to flick it through square leg but was too early on the shot and got hit on the pad
short of a length on leg stump, flicked off the pads through midwicket for a single
full toss outside off stump, that's a loose ball but Boucher can only drive it to long-off
Joginder finishes the over with a good length ball on middle stump which Morkel blocks off the front foot
short of a length delivery on middle stump, driven back past Pathan, mid-off runs around and fields
slower delivery on middle stump, flicked off the pads through square leg for a single
excellent line from Pathan around the off stump, Morkel tries to drive but inside edges it on to the pad
slower ball on middle and leg stump, Boucher gets beaten by the change of pace and gets hit on the pad
Morkel breaks free! Too wide from Pathan and Morkel frees his arms and dispatches it over cover for four
too wide outside the off stump once again, Morkel swings and misses and then looks expectantly at the umpire, Doctrove lets it pass
bowled flat and quick outside off stump, Boucher leans forward in defense and gets beaten
full toss on middle stump, poor ball, Boucher flicks it off his pads, he's hit that gently but the placement and timing is superb, the ball races to the square leg boundary
this time Boucher uses the pace of the ball and runs it past the fielder at short third man for four more
on the pads once again and Boucher once again flicks superbly to the backward square leg boundary, poor line from Harbhajan
another full toss but this time Boucher pushes it off his pads through midwicket for the single, South Africa have got plenty from this over
Morkel leans forward and lofts Harbhajan over extra cover, he's hit that well and long-off has to scamper around to cut off the boundary
slower ball on off stump, Boucher waits for it and square drives past point for a single
short and wide outside off stump, Morkel stands on the back foot and cuts down to Sreesanth at third man
short of a length outside off stump, Boucher stands on the back foot and drives to long off
Morkel drives a full and wide ball to the fielder on the deep cover boundary, the single brings up the 50 partnership, it's been invaluable for South Africa
full and straight from Pathan, Boucher meets it with a straight bat and drives past the non-striker's stumps
Pathan bowls a slower ball outside off stump but that's too wide
another slower ball outside off stump, Morkel has a massive heave at it, he was aiming for the deep midwicket boundary but didn't connect
terrible ball, full toss on the pads, Boucher flicks towards short fine leg where Pathan dives to his right to save a boundary
that's Morkel's first six and it's massive, length ball from Joginder and Morkel comes forward and hammers it over the straight boundary
Joginder replies with the bounces and smacks Morkel on the glove, the ball lobs up safely to the leg side and Morkel loses his helmet in the tangle he gets himself into
it's the slower ball this time, Morkel defends on the front foot
flicked off the pads through square leg
another slower ball, bowled full outside off, Boucher reaches out for it and drives to long-off
pushed off the front foot towards cover for one
bowled flat and quick, Morkel swings it down to long-on for one
tossed up on off and middle stump, Boucher tries to drive but gets an edge to short third man
bowled quick into the blockhole, Morkel drives it to long-on off the front foot
Boucher tries to drive but gets beaten outside the off stump
full toss on middle stump, flicked through midwicket for the single, just five off the over
and he starts with a terrible wide outside off stump, India have been extremely generous with the wides
short and wide outside off once again, Boucher reaches out for it and cuts to Uthappa at point
the length and line is spot on this time, around off stump, Boucher tries to pull but mis-times the shot
excellent ball, full and angling into the left-hander from round the wicket, Morkel digs it out towards point to bring up South Africa's hundred

what's going on? Boucher tried to drive a full ball from outside off stump through the off side, he got an inside edge that hit the stumps and dislodged a bail, Sreesanth didn't seem to realise and held his head in disappointment thinking the ball had missed the stumps, but it hadn't, it was bowled
that's another dot ball, excellent stuff from Sreesanth
cut off the back foot to third man for a single
defended on the front foot to the off side, the pressure is building
flicked off the pads through square leg for a single
bowled full and into the blockhole from round the wicket, Morkel edges it down to fine leg
Harbhajan tosses it up teasingly, Philander charges and tries to hit him straight down the ground, he misses and Karthik completes an easy stumping, South Africa are stumbling
sweeps and gets an inside edge to short thirdman
Morkel drives Harbhajan straight down the ground to long-on for two more
short of a length outside off stump, van der Wath has a swing across the line and misses
another good length ball skids on to van der Wath, he tries to pull but misses once again, another leg bye
RP Singh bowls a short ball which is too quick for Morkel, the ball is really skidding, he gets a top edge down to third man

bowled him! RP bowls a full ball on middle and off stump, Morkel clears his front foot out of the way and tries to hit through the on side, he misses and hears ball hitting wood, South Africa are sinking and somewhere New Zealand are celebrating
banged in short outside the off stump, Morkel tries to pull but mis-hits it towards cover
that was quick, the short ball banged in at 143 kmh, Morkel can't connect with the pull, India have a foot in the semis and so do New Zealand
low full toss, van der Wath hits it down the ground to long on, South Africa need 16 more
bowled full and fast into the blockhole, Morkel can only manage a single to midwicket, just a single, they need more
van der Wath swings wildly outside the off stump and can't make contact, South Africa are going out
van der Wath charges and has another swing but once again he gets beaten, Karthik whips off the bails in a trice and Harbhajan is elated, South Africa have been upset here, and New Zealand celebrate!
Ntini drives at one outside the off stump and edges it down to third man for four, but that's too little and too late
fired in full and fast into the pads, that's it, India have won and South Africa haven't qualified for the semis
